text: Ha Seok-Ju (born 20 February 1968) is a South Korean professional athlete. He is best known as an association football player. He was a member of the Korean national team.National-Football-Teams.com, Ha Seok-Ju; retrieved 2012-9-10. == Career statistics == === Club === Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League National cup League cup Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Daewoo Royals 1990 K League 24 4 ?
